column2: "Paul a ɔnam Nyankopɔn ne pɛ do yɛ Kraest Jesus no somafo dze nwoma yi kɛma ahotseweefo a wɔwɔ Efeso a wɔyɛ Kraest Jesus mu agyedzifo no."
"Adom nye asomdwee a ofi Nyankopɔn hɛn Egya nye Ewuradze Jesus Kraest no nka hom."
"Nhyira nka hɛn Ewuradze Jesus Kraest ne Nyankopɔn nye n'egya a ɔdze sunsum mu nhyira nyina ehyira hɛn wɔ sorsor wɔ Kraest Jesus mu:"
"dɛ mbrɛ ɔnam ɔdɔ mu yii hɛn wɔ Kraest mu ansaana wɔrehyɛ wiadze ase
column3: dɛ yɛnyɛ ahotseweefo nye hɔn a wonndzi dzɛm biara wɔ n'enyim no."

column2: "Oyii hɛn too hɔ dɛ ɔnam Jesus Kraest do bɛfa hɛn abayɛ ama noho dɛ mbrɛ ne pɛ enyisɔ tse
column4: "ama woeeyi n'adom a ɔdze adom hɛn no Dɔba no mu no n'enyimnyam ayɛw."

column2: "Ɔnoara no mu na yɛnam no bɔgyaa do enya hɛn pon yi
column3: mekyerɛ mfom mu fakyɛ a ɔnam n'adom ahonya do a."

column2: "Ɔama abor do ama hɛn wɔ nyansa nye nyimdzee nyina mu
column4: "na oeyi ne pɛ n'esumasɛm akyerɛ hɛn dɛ mbrɛ n'enyisɔ a osusui wɔ ne tsirmu no tse."

column2: "Dɛ mber no aso pɛpɛɛpɛr a wɔbɛka ndzɛmba nyina abɔ mu kor wɔ Kraest mu
column3: ɔyɛ ndzɛmba a ɔwɔ sorsor na asaase do nyinara."

column2: "Ɔno Kraest no ara so mu na hɛn so yeenya egyapadze
column3: dɛ mbrɛ nyia ɔnam ne pɛ apam do yɛ ndzɛmba nyina no
column4: nam ne tsirmpɔw do hyehyɛe too hɔ;"

column2: "dɛ hɛn a hɛn enyi daa Kraest do kan no mbɛyɛ n'enyimnyam ho ayɛyi."
"No mu so
column3: na hom tsee nokwar asɛm no a ɔyɛ hom nkwagye ho asɛmpa no. Ɔnoara mu so na hom gyee dzii no
column4: wɔdze Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn a wɔbɔɔ ho anohoba no a"

column2: "ɔyɛ hɛn kyɛfa ho nsewhyɛdze no asɔw hom ano. Iyi nye ɔgye a ɔdze agye hɔn a wɔyɛ nankasa nedze no ama n'enyimnyam ayɛyi no."
"Dɛm ntsi
column3: mo so metsee Ewuradze Jesus mu gyedzi a ɔwɔ hom mu
column4: nye ɔdɔ a hom dze dɔ ahotseweefo nyina no
column6: "minngyaa dɛ meda ase wɔ hom ntsi
column7: na mekaa hom wɔ me mpaabɔ mu."

column2: "Mobɔ mpaa dɛ hɛn Ewuradze Jesus Kraest ne Nyankopɔn no
column4: ɔmma hom nyansa nye nyikyerɛ sunsum wɔ no ho nyimdzee mu;"

column2: "dɛ hom adwen enyi ntsew
column3: na hom nhu ne frɛ no ho enyidado no
column4: nye n'egyapadze enyimnyam ahonya wɔ ahotseweefo no mu."

column2: "Afei so
column3: ɔmma hom nhu no tum kɛseyɛ mbordo a ɔwɔ hɛn a yɛgye dzi no do
column4: dɛ mbrɛ no tum ahoɔdzen ndzeyɛe a"

column2: "ɔdze yɛɛ adze wɔ Kraest mu nyaan no fii ewufo mu no tse. Ɔdze no tsenaa n'enyimfa wɔ sorsor
"wɔ mpanyindzi
column6: nye dzin a wɔbɔ nyina do
column7: nnyɛ wiadze mber yi mu nko
column8: na mbom dza ɔreba no so mu."

column2: "Ɔabrɛ adze nyina adze aba n'ananadze
column3: na ɔdze no ayɛ adze nyina do tsir ama asɔr no a"

column2: "ɔyɛ ne nyimpadua no
column3: nyia ɔhyɛ adze nyina ma wɔ ndzɛmba nyina mu no n'amayɛ mu."
